name: opres
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3)))

stmt.origin: baib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3)))
-| wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3)))
-| wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cres(c3, c1)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c3)))
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: Ordered pair membership in a restriction when the first member belongs to the restricting class. (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
